translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I am now sending to São Gabriel, to be delivered to the Justice of the Peace Correia, for him to forward to Your Excellency

God preserve Your Excellency Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira. War Secretariat Caçapava, December 26, 1839 Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Secretariat of the Republic To citizen Colonel João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division, wherever he may be. S. Gabriel Stamp on
